p: Additionally, when both the segment and subtype labels were taken into account, more different details appeared in such adaptations. As indicated in figure 7 A , most of the human-adaptive sequences (more than 50%) from swine were H3 or H1 in the hemagglutinin subtype and were N1 or N2 in neuraminidase subtype, with H3N8 as an exception. For avian sequences, H11N9, H4N8, H16N3, H3N2, H4N6, H5N2, H1N1, and H3N8 were at the top of the list ( fig. 7 B ).
